snippet: An Egyptian appeals court has overturned the conviction of one of the Arab world’s most famous comedians, who had been sentenced to jail for insulting Islam in his movies.
abstract: Egyptian appeals court overturns the conviction of one of the Arab world’s most famous comedians, Adel Imam, who had been sentenced to jail for insulting Islam in his movies.
lead_paragraph: An Egyptian appeals court has overturned the conviction of one of the Arab world’s most famous comedians, who had been sentenced to jail for insulting Islam in his movies.
